metadata.title: CVE-2015-8002 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The chunked upload API (ApiUpload) in MediaWiki before 1.23.11, 1.24.xbefore 1.24.4, and 1.25.x before 1.25.3 allows remote authenticated usersto cause a denial of service (disk consumption) via a file upload using onebyte chunks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8002` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
